cu.explanation_en: Setting the AMF IP address to an invalid value 'invalid_ip' will cause network connection failures and prevent the CU from communicating with the AMF.

du.explanation_en: Setting the CSI-RS enable flag to an invalid type 'invalid' will cause configuration parsing errors and prevent proper CSI-RS signal transmission.
du.explanation_zh: 將 CSI-RS 啟用旗標設定為無效類型 'invalid'，會導致配置解析錯誤，並阻止正確的 CSI-RS 信號傳輸。
